p: The mechanism of BPA genotoxicity might work throughout the incidence of oxidative stress and the depletion of antioxidant enzymes [ 9, 37]. Beside to that, BPA is an endocrine disruptor structurally similar to estrogen, exerts a weak estrogen-like effect as well as an anti-androgenic effect [ 38]. It revealed that estrogen causes DNA damage by estrogen-derived oxidants [ 39]. In addition, ISO et al. [ 40] observed that BPA causes estrogen receptor dependent genotoxicity.
